ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hiya, just got back from a Hate excursion. We had the same problem with train, but it didn t happen as often as it seems to have happened with you.. ?  We
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "M Sanford (Maev)" <pr0teus@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Plane of Hate
>Date: Sat, 06 Nov 1999 23:15:19 -0700
>
>Question to all servers once again? Has *any* imbrued armor dropped since
>the patch on this past
>Wednesday? The armor was supposedly moved to the plane of hate since it is
>no longer dropped on
>boogeymen, but none has dropped yet on any mobs on my server (Tarew Marr).
>I'm starting to
>believe Verant forgot to put our stuff in after they jacked it from
>boogeymen.
>
>Regarding the Maestro, how far in is he? You said it took 8 hours. And how
>hard is he? Does he
>cast any special type of spells?
>
>Also, when pulling mobs, have you had any weird bugs, where a single mob is
>pulled, and about 3
>minutes into the fight, 5 - 10+ mobs come outta no where and wipe out
>everyone? Even with monks
>feign pulling, and staying feigned while the rest of us fought so to keep
>aggro clear, we still
>get trained everytime.
>
>Maev Lorekeeper
>Tarew Marr
>

Hiya, just got back from a Hate excursion.

We had the same problem with train, but it didn't happen as often as it
seems to have happened with you.. ? We killed quite a few mobs, and then
suddenly a group of them rushes into the room and forces us to evac.

We had to let some nice rogue armor go to waste cuz none was there and one
of the pallys got a very nice 2 hander (forget what it's called, but it's
dmg 20, del 36, +5 STR, +something INT). We didn't get to the maestro
unfortunately because of two long corpse recoveries. =(

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 49th Chorus
Veeshan
